div.p: Due to the stay at home order, the USD 298 Board Meeting at 8 a.m. on Saturday, April 25th, will be broadcast using Facebook Live from the USD 298 Facebook page. If there are technical difficulties, the recording will be uploaded to the USD 298 You Tube Channel immediately following the meeting. A link will be posted after it's uploaded. Thank you for your patience and flexibility.

Children who are home from school and spending more time online may be at increased risk for exploitation. We urge you to watch for signs and if you suspect that your child is a victim, please report it to local law enforcement, the FBI or KBI.

LES Parents--If you haven't done this already, please fill out the LES Continuous Learning Plan Survey by clicking on the link below.
